snippet: Last year was dismal for hedge funds, according to an index maintained by Eurekahedge, an independent research firm that specializes in hedge fund data.
abstract: Last year was dismal for hedge funds, according to an index maintained by Eurekahedge, an independent research firm that specializes in hedge fund data.

byline.original: By KEVIN ROOSE and AZAM AHMED

headline.main: Hedge Funds End 2011 on a Very Bad Note
